Very fun game and more complicated than it looks like.
Many different strategies, killers, and perks. All of which can affect the game heavily for the best or the worst. (Depending on what side you're on, lol)

EDIT: Dead by Daylight is going on a downhill spiral. 
What's left of the community has been converted into try hards or toxic people who camp hooks, t-bag, and more. The new additions to the game aren't particularly fun, such as the killers. The new killers are dull, and nothing special besides the occasional good perk. That's why you'll play against the same classic killer a majority of the time. Maps are constantly being disabled for either "bug" fixes or "reworks" of a map that only needed slight changes, so you'll never be able to play all the maps. One dislike I hate about Dead By Daylight recently is their need to constantly throw in your face that they support LGBTQ+. Don't get me wrong, I absolutely support LGBTQ+, but to constantly bombard that in your face and posts about it and then add gay sexuality to the most manly character that came out 5 years ago in a horror game where sexuality adds no gameplay change and then brag about it on Twitter? Stupid corporate shit. 

The most enjoyable thing from Dead by Daylight nowadays is getting a god-tier loop, a well earned 4k, fun YouTube videos, custom games, and the no longer purchasable (fuck you Netflix) Stranger Things DLC. I think I will be a part of the community that puts down the game until it they learn and get better.
(The LGBTQ+ portion was not meant to offend those, just rather pointing out that I hate when a company bombards you about stuff like that.)

Es interesante el juego... pero el desbalanceo, el face camp y el tuneleo muy seguido le quitan toda la jugabilidad, no puede ser que toque el rango mas alto como killer contra puros rango bajo de superviviente.
Los killers se quejan del gen rush, y ellos lo unico que hacen es el camp face sin que ni siquiera se haga un generador, si pudiera pedir el reembolso lo pediria... buen juego pero pesimo el sistema de emparejamiento y la jugabilidad restada por los camperos.
Lo otro malo que tiene, es que, o son servidores brazuca o de usa, por lo cual en las tenemos tanto ping que tambien es casi imposible jugar ya que los killer te tiran de medio mapa de distancia

За вами когда-нибудь бегал бомж с бензопилой? Или может за вами бегал дед с герычем? НЕТ!? Тогда вам точно стоит поиграть в этот шедевр. Тут вам и бомж с бензопилой, и дед наркоман, а так же Ебанутая бабка которая блюёт на 360 градусов! куча эмоций, много переломов и боли в области плеча, потому что когда вас найдёт дед маразматик, то он точно насадит вас на крюк как мясо на шампур! Вы надеетесь что рас он маразматик, то он уйдёт и забудет о вас!? ХУЙ ВАМ! Он будет как настоящий маразматик сидеть в уголку и харкаться в прохожих дабы вас не сняли с крюка. 3 выживщих из 4

É um Bom Jogo.

Bugs - (Tem Bugs, Muitas Vezes Cômicos e outras vezes "Questionáveis")
Desbalanceamento - Killer ( O Killer dependendo do Balanceamento do Rank - Simplesmente não faz nada - Muitas vezes uma partida é iniciada com 4 Sobreviventes Rank Iridescente e um Killer que acabou de aprender o Tutorial )
Desbalanceamento - Survival ( Segue o Mesmo principio do Killer só que ao contrario )
Desbalanceamento - Rank (As vezes funciona, mas na maioria vai dar m@r@a )
Interface - ( Acho que poderia ser um pouco mais Pratica, as vezes com muita informação em lugares ruins visivelmente, principalmente em relação as historias dos personagens, quase comprei uma lupa para ler, não eu não tenho problema de visão )
Jogabilidade no Geral - ( É um jogo que eu recomendo contudo vale ressaltar que ele podia ser muito melhor, atualmente não há outros jogos que possam competir com o DBD nesse gênero e talvez por conta disso o jogo não tenha a devida atenção dos desenvolvedores(Behaviour). Espero realmente que o jogo VHS seja um bom jogo, talvez assim a Behaviour acorde e explore o verdadeiro potencial desse jogo )

Geral - ( É um jogo que você vai se divertir, vai fazer bons amigos, vai ser o Troll, vai passa raiva, vai Tomar no olho da goiaba com o desbalanceamento tanto com killer quanto para Surv, vai chorar de rir com bugs, vai chorar de raiva com Bugs, vai xingar toda a geração de um Killer quando ele usar o NOED assim como também vai xingar toda a geração de um Surv com lanterna. )

Enfim a Behaviour.

Queremos a Chucky!!! Queremos a Chucky!!! Queremos a Chucky!!!

Gran juego supuestamente cooperativo donde se enfrenta 1 asesino contra 4 posibles supervivientes, que a base de arreglar motores tienen que conseguir escapar del asesino. 
Tiene muchos asesinos famosos como el de Viernes 13, Freddy Krueger, el de SAW, el demogorgon de Stranger Things, de Resident Evil, de Silent Hill....

Pero falta Chucky!!! Queremos a Chucky!!!

First of all, I want to notice that all I’ll be saying next is MY honest opinion.

Dead by Daylight is the best game in the genre (remember what happened with Friday 13th and Phasmophobia). Lack of competition makes developers relaxed at some point. So they barely work on lags but at least they make a lot of new content (you should keep in mind it’s not free).
I don’t think this game has a big cyber sport future.

This game is pleasure to play with friends, you can also make some new ones here. Community is average — not too toxic and not too kind. Anyways, there are a lot of fan content which includes arts, self-made stories, YouTube let’s plays, guides, thousands of memes, even animated short parody films. The game has LORE, it is poor though. So it’s a big fandom and you can become a part of it.

Game play is pretty the same all the time, you can feel difference only if you play both — survivors and killers. There are a lot of maniacs with many insane abilities, but your goal is always the same which is basically to kill all four survivors. You can choose and use different perks and tactics to do that. A little bit sadder situation is if you play as a survivor. It doesn’t matter which character you play because only the way you look like changes (of course if you unlocked all perks). So how long you play how boring it becomes.
I think the optimal time a gamer can spend in this game is around 300-500 hours.
Also DbD has some elements of farm. There is a value called blood points. You get it in matches and with it you buy perks, offerings and items. It’s kind of difficult to play when you are a newbie and have no unlocked perks (all characters have their own 3 ones which you can buy for everyone on 30-35-40 lvls of each character). So first 100h you’re looking for blood points.

And there are a LOT OF skins for real money. Be careful with it, skins change nothing.

The game requires a long time to grind out blood points and iridescent shards to get perks and characters but I do enjoy playing the game overall because each killer adds a variety to how the game will be played and a multitude of perks that you can bring changes how you will do so as well. Each update comes with its own bugs but the development team -usually- fixes them pretty soon. usually. Community can be toxic at times but if you just reply gg wp then all is good and they won't bother you. Huge learning curve on some characters.
